task.title: Activate and Log in Your PBX

taskbody.context: After your PBX is created by your supplier or by Yeastar, you will get an email with the PBX activation link and activation code.

step.cmd: Click the PBX login link in the email.
step.stepresult: The activation page of Yeastar Cloud PBX appears.

step.cmd: Enter the activation code, click Activate.
step.stepresult: If the activation code is correct, you will log in the PBX.

step.cmd: Set your login username and password.

substep.cmd: On the Settings page, set the Email Address as the login email.
Set the login password and retype the password to confirm.

step.cmd: Log in your PBX using the email address.
